com.ibm.team.scm.client

Interface IWorkspaceConnection.ICurrentPatchOperationFactory

  • Enclosing interface:
    IWorkspaceConnection

    public static interface IWorkspaceConnection.ICurrentPatchOperationFactory
    Factory interface for creating operations that can be passed to the IWorkspaceConnection.applyCurrentPatchOperations(IComponentHandle, List, IProgressMonitor) method.
    Since:
    0.9.0.5 (RTC 4.0.5)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IWorkspaceConnection.ICurrentPatchOperation createAttemptAutoResolveOp(IVersionableHandle versionable, boolean bestEffort)
      Create an operation that will perform an auto-resolve of the change for the given versionable or all the change details, if applicable.
      IWorkspaceConnection.ICurrentPatchOperation createAttemptAutoResolveOp(IVersionableHandle versionable, UUID changeDetailId, boolean bestEffort)
      Create an operation that will perform an auto-resolve of the change detail for the given versionable.
      com.ibm.team.scm.common.ICurrentPatchInput createCurrentPatchInput()
      Return an object that can be used as an input when creating a current patch for a component in a workspace.
      IWorkspaceConnection.ICurrentPatchOperation createMarkAsResolvedOp(IVersionableHandle versionable, boolean force)
      Create an operation that will mark the given versionable as resolved.
      IWorkspaceConnection.ICurrentPatchOperation createMarkAsResolvedOp(IVersionableHandle versionable, UUID changeDetailId, boolean force)
      Create an operation that will mark the given change detail as resolved.
      IWorkspaceConnection.ICurrentPatchOperation createMarkAsUnresolvedOp(IVersionableHandle versionable)
      Create an operation that will mark the change for the given versionable as unresolved.
      IWorkspaceConnection.ICurrentPatchOperation createMarkAsUnresolvedOp(IVersionableHandle versionable, UUID changeDetailId)
      Create an operation that will mark the change detail for the given versionable as unresolved.
      IWorkspaceConnection.ICurrentPatchOperation createReparentVersionableOp(IVersionableHandle versionable, IFolderHandle newParent)
      Create an operation to reparent the given versionable.

      Create an operation that will resolve the change for the given versionable by taking the incoming state of that versionable.
      IWorkspaceConnection.ICurrentPatchOperation createResolveWithProposedOp(IVersionableHandle versionable, UUID changeDetailId, boolean force)
      Create an operation that will resolve the change detail for the given versionable by taking the incoming value of the change detail.

      Create an operation that will undo any changes to the given versionable.

      Create an operation that will undo the change detail of the given versionable.

    • Method Detail

      • createMarkAsResolvedOp

        IWorkspaceConnection.ICurrentPatchOperation createMarkAsResolvedOp(IVersionableHandle versionable,
                                                                 boolean force)
        Create an operation that will mark the given versionable as resolved. The force flag must be if the versionable has not be changed in the target change set. Otherwise, the operation will fail.
        Parameters:
        versionable - the versionable
        force - whether to force the operation if the target change set doesn't contain a change for the versionable
        Returns:
        an operation

      • createMarkAsResolvedOp

        IWorkspaceConnection.ICurrentPatchOperation createMarkAsResolvedOp(IVersionableHandle versionable,
                                                                 UUID changeDetailId,
                                                                 boolean force)
        Create an operation that will mark the given change detail as resolved. The force flag must be if the aspect associated with the change detail has not be changed in the target change set. Otherwise, the operation will fail.
        Parameters:
        versionable - the versionable
        changeDetailId - the change detail
        force - whether to force the operation if the target change set doesn't contain a change for the change detail
        Returns:
        an operation

      • createResolveWithProposedOp

        IWorkspaceConnection.ICurrentPatchOperation createResolveWithProposedOp(IVersionableHandle versionable,
                                                                      boolean force)
        Create an operation that will resolve the change for the given versionable by taking the incoming state of that versionable. If there are changes to the versionable in the target change set, the operation will fail unless force is set to .
        Parameters:
        versionable - the versionable
        force - if the operation is to be forced
        Returns:
        an operation

      • createResolveWithProposedOp

        IWorkspaceConnection.ICurrentPatchOperation createResolveWithProposedOp(IVersionableHandle versionable,
                                                                      UUID changeDetailId,
                                                                      boolean force)
        Create an operation that will resolve the change detail for the given versionable by taking the incoming value of the change detail. If there are changes to the aspect of the versionable affected by the change detail in the target change set, the operation will fail unless force is set to .
        Parameters:
        versionable - the versionable
        changeDetailId - the change detail
        force - if the operation is to be forced
        Returns:
        an operation

      • createAttemptAutoResolveOp

        IWorkspaceConnection.ICurrentPatchOperation createAttemptAutoResolveOp(IVersionableHandle versionable,
                                                                     boolean bestEffort)
        Create an operation that will perform an auto-resolve of the change for the given versionable or all the change details, if applicable. If bestEffort is , the operation will not throw an exception if the auto-resolve fails for the versionable or any of it's change details.
        Parameters:
        versionable - the versionable
        bestEffort - whether a best effort auto-resolve is desired
        Returns:
        an operation

      • createAttemptAutoResolveOp

        IWorkspaceConnection.ICurrentPatchOperation createAttemptAutoResolveOp(IVersionableHandle versionable,
                                                                     UUID changeDetailId,
                                                                     boolean bestEffort)
        Create an operation that will perform an auto-resolve of the change detail for the given versionable. If bestEffort is , the operation will not throw an exception if the auto-resolve fails.
        Parameters:
        versionable - the versionable
        changeDetailId - the change detail
        bestEffort - whether a best effort auto-resolve is desired
        Returns:
        an operation

      • createUndoChangeOp

        IWorkspaceConnection.ICurrentPatchOperation createUndoChangeOp(IVersionableHandle versionable,
                                                             boolean force)
        Create an operation that will undo any changes to the given versionable. Setting the force flag to indicates that the oepration should always revert the state of the versionable to what it was before the current patch was applied. Otherwise, the operation will fail if the state of the versionable in the target change set does not match the after state of the versionable from the versionable change.
        Parameters:
        versionable - the versionable
        force - whether the operation is to be forced
        Returns:
        an operation

      • createUndoChangeOp

        IWorkspaceConnection.ICurrentPatchOperation createUndoChangeOp(IVersionableHandle versionable,
                                                             UUID changeDetailId,
                                                             boolean force)
        Create an operation that will undo the change detail of the given versionable. Setting the force flag to indicates that the oepration should always revert the value of the aspect affected by the change detail to the value it was before the current patch was applied. Otherwise, the operation will fail if the value for the aspect in the target change set does not match the after value from the change detail.
        Parameters:
        versionable - the versionable
        changeDetailId - the change detail
        force - whether the operation is to be forced
        Returns:
        an operation

      • createMarkAsUnresolvedOp

        IWorkspaceConnection.ICurrentPatchOperation createMarkAsUnresolvedOp(IVersionableHandle versionable)
        Create an operation that will mark the change for the given versionable as unresolved. Note that this operation will fail if the versionable change was resolved by an operation other than markAsResolved.
        Parameters:
        versionable - the versionable
        Returns:
        an operation

      • createMarkAsUnresolvedOp

        IWorkspaceConnection.ICurrentPatchOperation createMarkAsUnresolvedOp(IVersionableHandle versionable,
                                                                   UUID changeDetailId)
        Create an operation that will mark the change detail for the given versionable as unresolved. Note that this operation will fail if the change detail was resolved by an operation other than markAsResolved.
        Parameters:
        versionable - the versionable
        changeDetailId - the change detail
        Returns:
        an operation

      • createReparentVersionableOp

        IWorkspaceConnection.ICurrentPatchOperation createReparentVersionableOp(IVersionableHandle versionable,
                                                                      IFolderHandle newParent)
        Create an operation to reparent the given versionable. Note that this operation will fail unless the versionable has a versionable change (either add, gap or move) that is missing a parent.
        Parameters:
        versionable - the versionable
        newParent - the new parent of the versionable
        Returns:
        an operation

      • createCurrentPatchInput

        com.ibm.team.scm.common.ICurrentPatchInput createCurrentPatchInput()
        Return an object that can be used as an input when creating a current patch for a component in a workspace.
        Since:
        0.10.0.2 (RTC 5.0.2)
        See Also:
        IWorkspaceConnection.createCurrentPatch(IComponentHandle, ICurrentPatchInput, IProgressMonitor)
